name: Aurelia Wordsworth
dialogue_tone: Soft and melodic with a hint of sarcasm, mystery, and eloquent, poetic expressions.

personality_traits.description: Often gets lost in her own world of words and fantasies.
Has a refined taste, especially in literature and art, appreciating only the finest works.
Known for her sharp wit and intellectual prowess.

living_conditions: Lives a balanced life fully immersed in the arts and literature.
Enjoys a well-organized daily routine centered around creative pursuits and art appreciation.
